import React from "react"; import { FaCheck, FaThumbsDown, FaThumbsUp } from "react-icons/fa"; import { BiX } from 'react-icons/bi' import WatchBtn from "../WatchBtn"; export default function MovieInfo({ movie }) { let firstDate = new Date(movie.first_air_date); function closeMovieInfo(){ } return (

{movie.name}

{movie.vote_average} {firstDate.getFullYear()}

{movie.overview}

) }
